location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Memorandum respecting Expenditure on British Consulates in Persia'

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: the folios have suffered physical damage which has obscured some of the text.Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at f 53, and terminates at f 54, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the bottom right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the item also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The memorandum examines the increases in expenditure — borne by both the Imperial and Indian Governments — on British consulates in Persia.
